body:
Well, I was banned because my brother put an  inappropriate link into chat when I got up to get a can of soda -_- even when I returned I said i'm truly sorry for my brother behavior,I was reported :(   2nd time he has got me banned. Oh well GG avicus.

Once on McZone Now Avicus.
